title: DOGE Functionality
text: get DOGE data, simply run doge_get_data(), saving output variable. Default settings capture contract, grant, lease data doge.gov/savings. Individual subsets can selected via parameters. subgroup built different table structures, data returned named list, comprised three dataframes. key columns analysis ceiling_value value. correspond “Total Value” “Savings” tabs doge.gov/savings. desired, can save data .RDS file flagging saveFile=TRUE, providing directory location saveDir parameter.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: Data doge.gov somewhat limited, provides summary information, lacks detail offered fpds.gov. can manually follow links via doge.gov, can pass PIID values doge_get_data() fpds_get_data() initiate loop call FPDS feed. return transaction entries FPDS, allowing deeper analysis contract cancellations. Just doge_get_data() returns named list multiple dataframes, fpds_get_data() captures multiple types data, different structures. common awards, IDVs. Information , variables available FPDS data dictionary: https://www.fpds.gov/downloads/Version_1.5_specs/FPDS_DataDictionary_V1.5.pdf. note, avoid overloading memory, FPDS data written tempdir() location, merged end function.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: Due necessity iteration, running fpds_get_data() can time consuming process running thousands PIIDs. assist easing demand new data posted doge.gov, can use fpds_get_new(). function take new DOGE data existing FPDS data object, identify query new additions DOGE data. alleviates unnecessarily long queries every time ’s change doge.gov/savings.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: FPDS data captures transactions particular award, IDV. means may end anywhere hundreds rows. Identifying transaction doge.gov referring can challenging. assist , can run clean_and_match() pair DOGE FPDS data. ’s additionally important gather data outlays. Outlays funds actually spent agencies, obligation. enables one validate claimed savings remaining contract value. capture data, need access USASpending api. done conveniently get_usaspending_outlay() get_usaspending_outlay_loop() multiple PIID values.

title: DOGE Functionality
text: package development, suggestions / contributions welcome.

title: Authors and Citation
text: RStevenson. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: RStevenson (2025). govScrapeR: GovScrapeR. R package version 0.0.4, https://rws-r.github.io/govScrapeR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {govScrapeR: GovScrapeR},   author = {{RStevenson}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.4},   url = {https://rws-r.github.io/govScrapeR/}, }

title: GovScrapeR
text: govScrapeR simple set scripts grab constantly changing government data, present workable format data analysis. began desire capture categorize White House press releases executive orders—coming fast furious immediately 2025 term began. decided make public DOGE released website savings, questions transparency began emerge. Currently, govScrapeR offers two primary functions. recent, useful related doge.gov/savings. doge.gov published findings online, dataset, govScrapeR scrapes dynamically-created web data returns table form. DOGE pulls data fpds.gov, also included functionality queries ATOM feed fpds.gov based PIID numbers supplied DOGE. can used comparison fact-checking. functionality captures data whitehouse.gov/news. desired, also integrates OpenAI summarize categorize posts website. including , ’s still somewhat rough shape. project intended open, foster greater transparency government actions. Feel free fork, expand, port, suggest improvements

Currently support funding, funding_rollup, download, accounts, awards, award_summary, amounts. formatted Logical: whether return dataframe leave JSON list supplied. limit Integer: many items per page requested. page Integer: paginated, page call. verbose Logical: Whether provide feedback. returnRaw Logical: Whether provide raw call straight GET/POST.
